comment: This professor teaches for free and makes sure you know he doesn't want to be there. Also, his lectures have NOTHING to do with the class. Skipped every class and made A's on every test. DO THE PRACTICE QUIZZES ONLINE. They are EXACTLY the tests.
He is a very good teacher.  He has online study guides you can consult for extra help and they are very in depth and precice.  Got a b in the class easy.

Not a hard class if you can kinda teach yourself. Class is about 100 people, and completly power point. You don't get alot of 1 on 1 time,thats what recitation is for. Test were very inconsistent. Some were really easy others weren't. Final was comprehensive and some of the stuff i had never seen before.Attendance is mandatory.

Dr. Gabrielli is a very good teacher and will work with you on anything you bring to him (Chemistry-wise at least). He is very passionate about his field of study, and makes chemistry pretty easy to work with. Attendance was 5% of the grade and he'll be more lenient the more you go. Attend class and review all his web material and you'll do well.
very good professor.  his lectures might seem confusing, but study his practice tests and the notes he gives you and you'll be just fine

If you got the notes for his test you are set.  You dont even have to go to class.  Just study the notes, take that practice tests, and show up to the test and your set.  Hes a good teacher with good test
